alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:48PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 115 PM EDT... At 1248 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palmetto Bay, or near Kendall, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, Pinecrest, Glenvar Heights, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, University Of Miami, West Perrine, Richmond Heights, Goulds, Sunset, South Miami Heights, The Falls, Howard and Palmetto Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
